label: shame

text_A: At hostel, my roommate was a very selfish person and would avoid á doing anyhting that did not concern him.  A few of us prepared lunch á together and had decided to share the work.  My roomate had á promised to do the same but I had to wash the bowls everytime á after dinner.  I tried to wait and thought that he would realize á his fault.  I did not want to tell him to do the work as he is a á university student and ought to have self-respect.  He á disappointed me and so every time I saw him I tried to avoid him á and did not want to keep any contact with him.
label: disgust

text_A: I met my ex boyfriend by chance.  We separated a few months ago á and I am now with a new boyfriend.  My ex boyfriend looked á depressed, and I know I am not to be blamed.
label: guilt

text_A: [ Do not remember any incident.]
label: disgust

text_A: When I succeded in establishing a contact with a girl (who is now á my girlfriend).
label: joy

text_A: On a trip to Santander a child sitting beside me fell ill and á started to vomit, seeing this made me feel very bad.
label: disgust

text_A: When I got very drunk and really misbehaved at Christmas.
label: guilt

text_A: When I read about or think about environmental pollution, the á armor race, starvation, etc. Then one realizes that mankind is á bad, most important is power and money, at the cost of nature and á mankind.
label: disgust

text_A: Being insulted in public.
label: shame

text_A: I was forced to leave an unforgettable friend.
label: sadness

text_A: When my grandfather died.
label: sadness

text_A: I was not given a chance to explain to my close relatives as to á why I could not go to visit them when they were ill.  When I did á go, they thought that I had been selfish and irresponsible duringá their illness.
label: anger

text_A: I got into a bad fight in a bar and my friend received a bad cut á above his left eye while trying to separate us.
label: guilt

text_A: After 10 days of hard work and having suffered many changes I á passed my last exam.
label: joy

text_A: When I slipped on a glazed frost road and a car almost ran into á me.
label: fear

text_A: I tried to date a girl, but she refused.
label: shame

text_A: When my mother got a terrible beating from my father.  It was so á bad that she fainted and it was only then that my dad realized á how bad it was.
label: disgust

text_A: I feel guilty as I am not working, and even my studies are not á progressing.
label: shame

text_A: [ No response.]
label: guilt

text_A: [ No response.]
label: disgust

text_A: When an old schoolfriend phoned me to arrange an appointment to á talk about old memories. I hadn't seen him for 8 years.
label: joy

text_A: My elder sister scolded me in front of my younger sisters and á cousins.  She said that I was very lazy and I felt so sad that I á cried myself to sleep.
label: sadness

text_A: Not being able to help my friend to do homework.
label: guilt

text_A: A great friend of mine travelled with the intention to change his á life. He didn't succeed and returned depressed. I had not power á to support his frustration and his behavioral change.
label: guilt

text_A: When my mother told things to my sister, which I told my mother á in confindence.
label: anger

text_A: When my father died.
label: sadness

text_A: At school, I detested the spinach gruel which had lumps of flour á in it.
label: disgust

text_A: I was ashamed at myself for having shouted at my daughter because á of my marital break-up and the unfair way I was treated.
label: shame

text_A: I was once this week angry when soemone trying to compress my á mind due to his nonsense speech which himself could not tolerate á at all.
label: anger

text_A: When my children were born.
label: joy

text_A: Two years ago I saw a film on the TV. Even now it makes me á afraid.
label: fear

text_A: When I think that I will probably never have a genuine contact á with my parents.
label: sadness

text_A: I was talking with an aunt of mine that I adore and I found á courage to say \I love you\" and just after that came the shame."
label: shame

text_A: When I talked to a psychotherapist for the first time, I started á to cry; first I talked to him but he did not say anything and á after a while I was crying.
label: shame

text_A: Years ago, on my way to school by the forest path I came across á an exhibitionist.
label: fear

text_A: My roommate leaving my drawers in a mess after plowing thourgh á them looking for something.
label: anger

text_A: Three weeks ago a friend of mine bid me good-bye before going á abroad.  I felt happy for her as she was achieving something by á making the trip, but I also felt sad as I would not be seeing her á for a long time.
label: sadness

text_A: I had told a person unpleasant things in a bad manner. He was á very depressed and caused an accident.
label: guilt

text_A: The mother of a small child found me shaking the child in á exasperation, because I couldn't get it to sleep.
label: shame

text_A: During a football game, another player who was perspiring very á strongly ran into me.
label: disgust

text_A: When my mother and father separated (it was a brief separation á and they are together now).
label: sadness

text_A: An unjust calumny concerning me.
label: anger

text_A: When one teacher unjustly gave me zero in a test saying that I á was cribbing.
label: anger

text_A: A close relative of mine died in a serious car accident.  I was á one of the first two people to see the corpse and I had to do it. á  Before going in to see it I was afraid as it was the first time á that I was seeing a corpse.
label: fear

text_A: A recurrent lovesickness.
label: joy

text_A: Heard some ghost-like noise at night.
label: fear

text_A: My mother wrote me and said that I would not writ enough letters á home.
label: guilt

text_A: Being harrassed for being gay; suggestions of being physically á beaten - acting as informal bouncer in a gay bar.
label: fear

text_A: After my boyfriend and I had separated.
label: sadness

text_A: The last time I felt sad and disappointed was when I did not do á as well as I had hoped in one of the final exams.  As compared á with the earlier exams, the questions, I think, were unjust.
label: sadness

text_A: When a classmate wanted to sit down, I pulled his chair away, so á that he was slightly injured.
label: guilt

text_A: When I was young I felt guilty because I thought that I had á commited a grave sin.
label: guilt

text_A: When my father talks about our relatives and favours them, I feel á angry.
label: anger

text_A: When I realized that I was pregnant.  I thought about what my á relatives and friends would think about me and I felt a lot of á self pity.
label: shame

text_A: When my brother was held up and robbed.
label: anger

text_A: When I found out that the guy I was dating at a particular time á had a steady relationship going on with someone else for a long á time.
label: anger

text_A: I had found out that I was pregnant. I talked it over with my á boyfriend and he was unsupportive - yet encouraged an abortion - á I did.
label: guilt

text_A: I was supposed to go out with my girlfriend one Saturday night, á but I got really drunk with some friends earlier that afternoon á and evening. So, I totally forgot about going out with my á girlfriend. She showed up the next day, and that was when I á remembered.
label: shame

text_A: Waiting for a taxi - when within 1/2 an hour two separate people á challenged me to fight for no apparent reason except they were á drunk.
label: fear

text_A: When I had promised to do some washing for my mother and I did á not do it.  She did it herself despite her being ill.  I felt á very guilty.
label: guilt

text_A: With my mouth full of bun, I drank directly from a packet of milk á which turned out to be weeks old (completely separated).  It took á a while for the milk to seep through the bun.
label: disgust

text_A: When I was fighting with my elder brother I unintentionally hurt   á him in the eye with a wooden bar.  I felt guilty and feared that á he would be blind, fortunately he recovered after 15 days.
label: guilt

text_A: When I made up with a girl-friend of mine after having been on á unfriendly terms with her (my fault).  I cried with joy that á evening.
label: joy

text_A: Someone, who was sitting very close to me, was smoknig in the á compartment of an air conditioned mini-bus.
label: disgust

text_A: When a close friend, residing in the hostel, lost his father I á really pittied him and the situation made me feel sad.
label: sadness

text_A: In the classroom we discussed with the teacher. He told me things á that affected directly in a negative way my job and my behavior á in the classroom in front of the other pupils.
label: shame

text_A: When I did bad on a chamistry midterm which I could have done á well.
label: sadness

text_A: One night my father suddenly suffered from a heart attack which á lead to breathing difficulties.
label: sadness

text_A: Death of the family dog.
label: sadness

text_A: When I attended school, our class visited an institution for á mentally and physically handicapped persons. Although I tried to á control my feelings, I was disgusted.
label: disgust

text_A: We were in a disco and the evening was not at all pleasant.  á Despite my not knowing why, I was angry with my companion.  I let á him feel my bad humour as I cannot hide my feelings.
label: anger

text_A: A nuisance used to live in our flat a month ago. I experienced á this feeling when I tried to chase her out.
label: anger

text_A: While I was pushing a court roller out of a ditch, I slipped and á fell down and the roller rolled back towards me -down slope-It is á a miracle that I still have my legs intact.
label: fear

text_A: When I saw several people washing their car with water from a á drain.
label: disgust

text_A: I felt very sad when I saw the first list from the names of the á people who entered at the University and my name wasn't there.
label: sadness

text_A: I wanted to go to a friend of mine who had a party; at the moment á I wanted to leave, my father said I couldn't go because he needed á me for some work in the afternoon.
label: anger

text_A: After I had managed to fail my first year at University I was á scared as to what I was going to do with my future. I didn't want á a mundane 9-5 job and yet I didn't know if I could pay my way á through an unsubsidized year at university to settle down and á continue my studies.
label: fear

text_A: I feel fear quite often but this feeling was very strong last á year when my husband was quite unexpectedly sent to the hospital.
label: fear

text_A: I worked with several classmates on a project.  I was very á anxious about the project while my partners showed no concern  á and when we had meetings on the project my classmates  did not á pay any attention.  Some of them read books while the others á argued on irrelevant questions.  The meeting would go on for two á hours without the main theme being discussed.  We wasted time and á could not reach a compromise.  My classmates avoided doing the á work and the responsibilities, they seemed to value other á projects more than this one.
label: anger

text_A: My friend has to go on field trips, he just told me.
label: sadness

text_A: When I was in a car with my parents and friends and we had to á back up (reverse) pass a river which when I recall it (I was only á about 5 yrs) seemed we were going to fall in and drown.
label: fear

text_A: Before my final examination.
label: fear

text_A: When I was travelling by tram, I tripped and fell against the á door.  I thought that I was going to fall out.
label: fear

text_A: [ Never.]
label: fear

text_A: When for the first time I rode on a motorcycle with my brother.  á He was going so fast that I felt that I would fall off without my á brother realizing it.
label: fear

text_A: In a party of friends I got completely drunk.
label: shame

text_A: [ Uncertainty about my own abilities in an exam.]
label: fear

text_A: I was skiing alone and the mountain became covered with mist and á I thought I was lost and was going to panic.
label: fear

text_A: When my boyfriend was away, I flirted with his best friend; I á felt guilty the next day.
label: guilt

text_A: I wrote a letter to my father to ventilate my bottled up á feelings. Afterwards I thought it was too negative.
label: shame

text_A: Our basketball team is undefeated in league play (4-0) currently.
label: joy

text_A: Our boarder burping after meals !
label: disgust

text_A: One night going downstairs, and hearing a strong stirring of á brances, which was not the wind.
label: fear

text_A: It was when a friend took me to a place and gave me as a gift my á astrologycal map with the explanations of a psychologist.
label: joy

text_A: A person I trusted a lot gave me many false explanations to á justify a wrong action.
label: anger

text_A: Adultery with the girlfriend of a friend of mine, of which he á learned.
label: shame

text_A: When my father died.
label: sadness

text_A: I felt it when on duty in the hospital I understood that I was á not afraid to face death, that I also helped a little to relieve á the pains of a patient.
label: joy

text_A: I felt afraid when I smoked maryhuana for the first time in my á life with a lot of friends in the middle of the street at day á brake.
label: fear

text_A: When I was accused of neglecting work for the wrong reasons.
label: sadness

text_A: I was spending a few days at my aunt's place.  One night I got á home very late, I had told them I was going to a party but I went á to another place.  They were very worried.
label: guilt

text_A: When I went to a halloween party and had to walk through a shopping á center dressed like a witch.
label: shame

text_A: Disgust with oneself after being intoxicated enough to go to bed á with a stranger.
label: disgust

text_A: [ When after a night of sleeping in another's arms, one wakes á alone and knows that the lonely arms of the night are not the á same that one meets in the morning.]
label: sadness

text_A: Getting a D in a class last semester and knowing it was because I á didn't study.
label: guilt

text_A: I was at home alone, and heard noises on the roof, and doorknobs, á and drawers.
label: fear

text_A: When I drove to Stockholm for the first time and drove off the á Stora Hissingen road at the wrong exit.
label: fear

text_A: Overhear people talking about me and saying that I am stupid.
label: anger

text_A: My flatmate and close friend living and sleeping with another á close friend of mine.
label: disgust

text_A: I was so sick that my relatives thought that I was bewitched.  I á felt like dying.
label: fear

text_A: It was in the evening when I heard that my girl went to Zambia á and that she would never come back.
label: sadness

text_A: Loss of close relative.
label: sadness

text_A: When there was a bomb threat in Tolman Hall. This was the first á time that I felt my life could be in danger.
label: fear

text_A: When I found out the CIA was mining Nicaraguan harbors.
label: disgust

text_A: When I was young I was told to to the shop to buy a dozen eggs.  á I went and asked for one egg and the people in the shop laughed á at me and so did my family when I told them what had happened.
label: shame

text_A: Housesitting and hearing the alarm go off. I knew someone had to á be breaking in. I called the police and was panicking while on á the phone. It was awful. It turns out that I stepped on the á hidden alarm without prior knowledge of its existance.
label: fear

text_A: NO RESPONSE.
label: guilt

text_A: When I heard that my father had been involved in a car accident á in Lusaka.  This happened when he had gone to get the car which á had been stolen in Lusaka.
label: sadness

text_A: After completing high-school, I wanted to go abroad for a á holiday.  I had never been abroad before and neither had I taken á a holiday for a long time.  When finally my parents agreed and we á got the airplane tickets I was over joyed.
label: joy

text_A: A person with whom I had been on bad terms, gave me a present. We á became reconciled.
label: joy

text_A: When I was unable to respond to a welcome in my indigenous á language of Maori at an important function where I was the only á woman in the group and it was expected of me.
label: shame

text_A: My father suddenly fell ill and died.
label: sadness

text_A: Having gone to school without learning anything, as usual.
label: anger

text_A: When seeing a friend that I had not seen in a long while.
label: joy

text_A: I feel disgusted when people do not understand me in the right á way, i.e they misunderstand me.
label: disgust

text_A: One day, I discussed a very important question with A.  A á suddenly declared that he would not accept my position and á thought that he himself was right.  Moreover, he attacked  á strongly, not my opinion but me personally.
label: anger

text_A: Going out with another girl besides my girlfriend and not telling á her.
label: guilt

text_A: A day when I was getting out of the shower I covered only the á front part of my body with a towel (I was 7 years old), and I á didn't see that my cousin was in the room.
label: shame

text_A: A few days ago, I hitch-hiked to Arnhems with a friend. á Everything went well: they picked us up very quickly, the sun was á shining, I was feeling free and, for the first time after long á time, happy. I really had the feeling that I was living at full á speed.
label: joy

text_A: Some time ago I slapped my son without trying to understand who á the real culprit of a damage was. After that I felt guilty and á bad but it was too late.
label: guilt

text_A: As part of the assessment I had to speak on a subject in front á of the class. I was not really prepared and I was just reading á the stuff I had on a piece of paper, when some of the students  á asked me something I could not give them an answer.  I felt á ashamed as I had not prepared the topic.
label: shame

text_A: When a girl I knew aborted and threw the seven month foetus in a á man-hole.
label: disgust

text_A: When my little sister was sick at home and I thought that she á would die.
label: fear

text_A: When my uncle died whom I had loved very much. I was very sad and á I felt totally helpless.
label: sadness

text_A: I had to change a baby's clothes for the first time.
label: disgust

text_A: When I tried to explain to a plumber, face to face, that the á toilet was broken and he did not believe it (it had been mended á ten times).
label: anger

text_A: A drunken man forced me to kiss him.
label: disgust

text_A: When we were able to afford a new sofa - a leather one which cost á SEK 20000.  I had waited for it for 2-3 years.
label: joy

text_A: Disgust with myself for consistently making foolish errors in á communicating with others (asking for 1/2 Kg of nuts when I only á wanted 50 g).
label: disgust

text_A: I once stole a shirt from the Department Store in which I work. I á have been promoted to work in a very privileged section of the á store. Their belief in my integrity makes me feel even guiltier.
label: guilt

text_A: When people next to me play the fool.
label: shame

text_A: When a colleague asked me for help at work, despite the fact á that he had more time to do it than I had.
label: anger

text_A: I was alone at home, a man forced the front door which was á locked, forced and tried to open a window.
label: fear

text_A: Not being able to do well to be chosen for the English lecture.
label: sadness

text_A: Yesterday my friend gave me a gift and had dinner with me.
label: joy

text_A: In the student's union there was someone who took the photocopies á of two large volumes.  I asked him to let me take a few, he refused á it for an acceptable reason.
label: anger

text_A: When I worked at the life-saving service I was disgusted by a á patient whose outward appearance was distasteful.
label: disgust

text_A: When I heard a rumour that the 1st year exam results were out. I á had fear that I might be one of the failures.
label: fear

text_A: My little cat which I had raised all by myself, hanged itself when á playing in the garden.
label: sadness

text_A: There was a lot of irritation between me and a person who lives á in the same house where I live. Suddenly it became too much for me and I á accused him of several things.
label: anger

text_A: When someone pointed out that I was proud, yet I didn't dress up á properly. This was when I and my friend went for a dnce one á Saturday.
label: shame

text_A: I received the message that I'd been accepted at the school where I á really wanted to go.
label: joy

text_A: I felt disgust when I received visitors at an odd hour. I was á seriously preparing for Examinations, so I did not appreciate á their coming.
label: disgust

text_A: Two days after the above incident, I was thinking about my á morally shameful act and I felt sorry for that incident, but it á was too late, however I did realize this.
label: guilt

text_A: That a friend had been badly beaten and stabbed many times and á the person that did it got away without any punishment from the á law.
label: anger

text_A: With a group of handicapped people we went to a party. When we á wanted to leave we were not able to find one of these people. I á had told his mother that we would leave at 4.30 p.m., actually it á was planned for 3.30 p.m. Therefore there was a delay.
label: guilt

text_A: When I was 8 years old, I would usually come home from school á with my mother in a car.  For the first time I had to take the á school bus, and I mistook the bus stop and found myself two á kilometres away from where I lived.  I was very scared, wondering á how I would get back home.
label: fear

text_A: This was what I felt when my boyfriend went to Bourgas to study á there. I had the feeling I would lose him. Anyway the distance á Plovdiv-Bourgas seemed to me so great.
label: fear

text_A: I found a cockroach crushed between two folders in my bedroom, I á called my mother.
label: disgust

text_A: A few days after I had finished the relationship with my á boyfriend, we had a quarrel. Then he hit me. At that moment I á found him disgusting.
label: disgust

text_A: When I think of death - not my own but that of my parents, á brothers and sisters.
label: fear

text_A: After having been ill, when I was coming back to the hostel, I á felt very sad leaving home.
label: sadness

text_A: I was working in a classmate's house with a group. A girl began á to graze her foot against mine under the table.
label: disgust

text_A: Some days ago I fell down at a public place, I came into notice á but thank God I was not mocked at. Though it hurt badly, at the á first moment I felt shame, not ache.
label: shame

text_A: When I did not get the salary increase that I had been expecting á and understood how little one's work was appreciated.
label: sadness

text_A: When I had to lie about my age to be accepted as a member of a á group.
label: guilt

text_A: When I thought for an instant that a very good relationship with á a person had finished.
label: sadness

text_A: When I see all the putridness of people. The fact is the catarrh á and spits that whash the streets of S.Paulo.
label: disgust

text_A: Suddenly found out that I was the lasr one to leave the anatomy á room.
label: fear

text_A: When an uncle of mine who is very ill started to cough wich á sounded very dirty. (He can't help it of course).
label: disgust

text_A: I had met someone and we became good friends. Our relationship á grew closer and now he is my boyfriend. I felt joy when I found á out how he felt about me.
label: joy

text_A: I felt joy when I entered at the University.
label: joy

text_A: Succeeding in helping others.
label: joy

text_A: When the whole family gets together for a one week holiday.  á Everybody feels free and the trip is well planned.  It works out á well and we enjoy ourselves.
label: joy

text_A: Not included on questionnaire.
label: fear

text_A: A break-up with someone I really liked.
label: sadness

text_A: I lost my way on a trip in the mountains.
label: fear

text_A: Not collecting homeworks in time to give the teacher.
label: shame

text_A: An out-patient asked me to read for him a certain prescription á but I was unable to do so. The patient was dissappointed and lost á hope in me.
label: shame

text_A: Somebody was blaming me of a story which was not real and not á true.
label: anger

text_A: I work for a journal. Once the lay-out came to nothing, due to á thoughtlessness of some colleagues.
label: anger

text_A: I was walking in the wood at night with my boyfriend. Very á romantic. Suddenly I heard a car driving very slowly with the á lights out, it looked as if they were looking for something.
label: fear

text_A: I was ashamed to tell my mother that I fell down with a bicycle.
label: shame

text_A: When my grandmother passed away.
label: sadness

text_A: At an anti-pornography meeting, when samples from films and á magazines were shown.
label: disgust

text_A: I came across a girl at the school bus-stop, I had seen her á several friends as she was a friend's friend.  However my friend á had never introduced me to her and when she got off the bus I á smiled at her but she did not respond pretending not to have seen á me.  Her arrogant behaviour made me sick and angry.
label: anger

text_A: Hearing my girlfriend accept my offer of marriage.
label: joy

text_A: When a soppy poem that I had written to a boy was found and every á one read it and started teasing me about it.
label: shame

text_A: The time that I had to put my dog to sleep.
label: guilt

text_A: The first time that I had to go up on the stage to give a speech.
label: shame

text_A: When diving deep into the sea to reach the floor I felt á breathless. I was cautious but I doubted I should be able to come á to the surface and inhale.
label: fear

text_A: On one occasion whilst engaging in horseplay with my girlfriend, á I caused her to be physically harmed.
label: shame

text_A: Some time ago I was present at the wedding party of two close á friends of mine.
label: joy

text_A: My fiancee and I were at my parent's place watching TV. There á were  only two TV-chairs and we were sitting on them when my á drunken brother came in and rudely chased my fiancee off the á chair she was sitting on.
label: anger

text_A: I was caught doing something bad and I bribed the person who á caught me.  Later I felt very bad, maybe I should have paid for á my bad behaviour.
label: guilt

text_A: When I did not get admission in M.Sc after my B.Sc, I felt really á bad.  When I started my journey to Bombay, after having accepted á my uncle's offer to come to Bombay, I was afraid, wondering if I  á would succeed or not.
label: fear

text_A: I feel guilty when when I realize that I consider material things á more important than caring for my relatives.  I feel very á self-centered.
label: guilt

text_A: When I saw a car run over a child, out of carelessness.
label: anger

text_A: When my friend let my personal matters be publicaly known.
label: shame

text_A: My sister was in a hospital, later in the evening we received the á information that she had died.
label: sadness

text_A: One night I had a sexual intercourse with another man.  My sexual á desire and my curiosity had made me jump into bed with him.  I am á ashamed of myself now.
label: shame

text_A: My sister had promised to help me to do a translation from á English into German. But the day I needed her she told me that á she was busy - I was very angry.
label: anger

text_A: When they put the blame on me when I scored the third goal at the á match.
label: anger

text_A: Some days ago I had a car accident. It was quite slight but á through my fault. I felt strong shame because I had the spirits á of a good driver.
label: shame

text_A: I felt this feeling during the exam in higher mathematics.
label: shame

text_A: When a close friend of mine maintained a relationship with me á till she needed me and broke it off when she did not need me.  á She behaved life a really selfish person.
label: disgust

text_A: When I found a maggot in my food at the dinning hall, all the á food had gone bad.
label: disgust

text_A: Some students whose English is worse than mine can go to your á lectures (English lectures).
label: disgust

text_A: When my girlfriend of two years told me it was all over.
label: anger

text_A: [ No response.]
label: sadness

text_A: [ Never experienced.]
label: guilt

text_A: In Ward 1A was an epileptic patient who was burnt the whole body á and was stinking very much such that the whole ward was affected. á Few people could come near him.
label: disgust

text_A: My girlfriend started singing (she cannot sing) and did not stop á despite my asking her to do so.
label: anger

text_A: A certain boy came into my room and started telling me that I was á not pretty, that I had no manners and that I should learn some.  á I had just come to campus and he was in fourth year.
label: anger

text_A: I was about to begin a journey in a car with an acquaintance of á mine.
label: fear

text_A: When, for example, my grandfather fell seriously ill. It was á necessary for him to be operated and I felt great fear of losing á him because he is so dear to me.
label: fear

text_A: When I found out that I had failed to pass my exams during the á term by one point.  The fact that exactly the same thing had á happened last term did not help.
label: sadness

text_A: When I was driving my motorbike I went into a bend incautiously á and fell down. I was slightly hurt, the motorbike was slightly á damaged.
label: guilt

text_A: Saying goodbye at the airport to my boyfriend who has to go to á school back East. We are very close and have been together 4 á years.
label: sadness

text_A: Whenever I am late, I feel ashamed of myself even though no one á tells me anything.
label: shame

text_A: Sadness - this is an emotion which I have felt very often á recently. I can't remember a concrete example. I will describe my á general impression from severl situations which evoked this á feeling in me.
label: sadness

text_A: A certain person started to say dreadful things very calmly, I á felt hurt and disgusted.
label: anger

text_A: Close friend leave to go overseas for an indefinite period. á Farewell scene at airport.
label: sadness

text_A: When someone in my family died.
label: sadness

text_A: We had had a party the night before and we still had some liquors á left the morning after. I went to the kitchen pretending to á prepare some tea and was caught by my fiancee pouring some rum á down my throat.
label: guilt

text_A: A friend of mine that is abroad undertook recently an axam to á enter on University in Dallas, and was approved.
label: joy

text_A: I studied medicine for several semesters and at that time I á developed a great fear of examinations. I was most afraid of my á examination of anatomy. While other students were examined, I was á dissecting. I was able to hear everything and was waiting with á fear until it was my turn.
label: fear

text_A: I imagined I heard footsteps up the hall while sleeping in bed á one night by myself in the house.
label: fear

text_A: When a friend told me that my education had nothing to do with á our discussion.  This friend has failed the 7th grade, what made á me angry was that I had not used my education to argue.
label: anger

text_A: Getting ill.
label: fear

text_A: When I was accepted as a student.
label: joy

text_A: During my Summer vacations I planned a carnival for the community á youth center with a few other volunteers.  I was the head of the á organizors and we spent over a month planning it.  During this á period we got to know and understood each other.  We á discovered each others potential and we planned many interesting á things for the carnival.  The day of the carnival everything was á bright, the programmes went well and the attendants enjoyed it.  á I felt extremely excited about it.
label: joy

text_A: My grandfather was seriously ill, he had only a few days left to á live. I had always loved him, but never told him. When I saw him á for the last time, I had the feeling that I had omitted so many á things I could not do again. - There was a fly sitting on his á forehead and he was too weak to drive it away. I was very sad á when I saw that.
label: sadness

text_A: At my native place I was riding my cycle, which did not have á lights, at night and so a police man caught me.  I requested him á to let me go but he would not so after a few minutes I just á escaped.
label: guilt

text_A: During my last exam.
label: anger

text_A: I tried my level best to care for my client, I took an á appointment with a doctor and before meeting the doctor he á expired - a poor small boy from Uttar Pradesh.
label: sadness

text_A: I mangled the side of my dad's van on a fence. I did not realize á the extent of the damage until he showed it to me the next day. á The shock on my face was genuine so a friend interceded with a á good excuse which I did not deny. I never clarified the á situation.
label: guilt

text_A: I received a poor grade on a midterm even though I got all the á right answers and knew the material. I went to the TA to try to á raise my grade and he wouldn't do it.
label: anger

text_A: We were starting a student project, and the teacher we talked to á was very negative and not very helpful.
label: anger

text_A: I once felt shame when I failed to fulfil the promise to marry a á daughter of a certain gentleman.
label: shame

text_A: When I got my B.Sc degree with first class.
label: joy

text_A: Someone frightened me in the dark.
label: fear

text_A: Car accident nearly occurred between us and drunk driver coming á in opposite direction it missed us by approx 1 m and collided á (after rolling twice midair) into nearby scrub.
label: fear

text_A: I caught a glimpse of a black-beetle.
label: disgust

text_A: Whenever I am alone in a dark room, walk alone on the street, á sleep alone in the room at night or see something which is only á partly visible.  This emotion was very strong when as an 8 year   á old child I saw something horrible.
label: fear

text_A: When I have been overhastingly offending or hurting.
label: guilt

text_A: [ I have never felt this emotion.]
label: guilt

text_A: My boyfriend and I did not have any contact with each other during  á the Summer holidays.  I met him the day of the registration and looked  á through him.  In the canteen he asked me if I wanted to have a drink and  á I said no as I did not want him to do me a favour.
label: disgust

text_A: While having a discussion with my mother, I realized that she á does not for a moment doubt the justification of her making the á decisions concerning my life.
label: anger

text_A: [ No response.]
label: fear

text_A: The death of my father made me feel quite guilty, because my á attitude towards him had been cold and indifferent.
label: guilt

text_A: When I saw a person I had not seen for a long time.
label: joy

text_A: I borrowed a piece of music of someone and I always forgot to á give it back. That person wrote me a letter asking me to give it á back. I did so and I told him an idle story why I kept it for so á long.
label: guilt

text_A: One evening I saw the old guard-man I knew, change into something á inhuman for about 5-10 seconds, this really frightened me.
label: fear

text_A: My girlfriend was away visiting another city and I brought á another girl home. Next morning when I started getting sober I á felt quite ashamed of myself.
label: shame

text_A: A female friend was violently ill on the return journey from a á wedding reception we attended. Getting her out of the car when á home took quite a while.
label: disgust

text_A: When I heard my grandfather's wife had leukemia I was very sad.
label: sadness

text_A: A scene in a film in which one man repressed another one. By á concidence, their position was reversed. The other man was á repressed in an identical way as he did before.
label: disgust

text_A: Guilty when I hadn't walked my dog for quite a few days and had á given her no attention.
label: guilt

text_A: A colleague's 17 year old daughter is seriously ill with cancer á and has only a year to live.  I  heard about it 6 weeks ago.
label: sadness

text_A: I was alone in the bus when I tripped and fell, and dropped all á my papers.
label: shame

text_A: When I read the newspaper that morning I found my candidature á number on the admission list of the Chinese university.  I was á satisfied and happy and the cumulative anxiety disappeared.  I á only wanted to cry out that I had succeeded.
label: joy

text_A: Insulted by other people in the shop.
label: anger

text_A: Failed to be elected to be a class leader.
label: anger

text_A: About not helping my sister when she asked me to help her on her á chemistry class. I pretended to be busy.
label: guilt

text_A: I send a word to my boss through my servant telling him that I á would not report for work as I was not feeling well and that the   á doctor had refused to give me sick leave.  My intention was á actually to go out of Lusaka for a week-end.  I left the same day á and the following morning my boss found me in Mongu.  I felt á guilty when asked to explain things on my return.
label: guilt

text_A: This feeling occurred to me when my colleague entered in G.V. á (University) and I didn't.
label: anger

text_A: I was sitting on the bus coming back from school. A man from á nearly forty years sat beside me. After a while I looked at him á and saw that he was looking at me with opened throusers and á holding his penis.
label: fear

text_A: One day I went to the cinema to see a film in which I was á interested.  On arriving there I saw a long queue (which I had á not expected) and went back home without seeing the film.
label: fear

text_A: Finding out that some students are getting good reports they do á not deserve.
label: disgust

text_A: I felt guilty when I was found to be the chief leader of making á noise in class.
label: guilt

text_A: When I heard that I had passed my MCE Exam, I spent the whole á day dancing and eating sugarcanes from our garden.
label: joy

text_A: When I am made to do things in which I see no sense and I waste á my time. Some time ago I had to participate in a sociological á investigation and then I got really angry.
label: anger

text_A: While playing a ball game, I was just about to make a goal when I á was thrown off my feet, and I failed to score the goal.
label: anger

text_A: My girlfriend came home after a business dinner at the most á expensive place in town drunk as a skunk. Whats more she drove á home and couldn't remember doing so. I was disgusted by her state á and her actions.
label: disgust

text_A: When someone accuses me without reason and is not willing to á listen to me.
label: anger

text_A: The high school entrance exam.
label: joy

text_A: When I was transferred from Chichiri Secondary School to St. á Mary's Sec. School. I was happy at Chichiri as a day scholer and á had made a lot of friends. I was going to a boarding and that á meant parting with my friends as well as my boyfriend for the á first time.
label: sadness

text_A: after getting a fail notice for a math class, I realized I was á not doing very well in school in any subject. I began to fear á failing a class or two.
label: fear

text_A: I think I have hardly had a situation where I felt disgusted. á Perhaps once, when I saw a big spider.
label: disgust

text_A: When I fought with my sister and said that she had provoked this. á She was very seriously scolded.
label: guilt

text_A: I was to prepare relish for the family. I overcooked it and no á one liked the meal that day.
label: guilt

text_A: When my brother who has been out of New Zealand for 10 years came á to visit with his wife which none of our family had previously á met.
label: joy

text_A: When I swindled money out of someone.
label: shame

text_A: When I came back from my holidays.
label: sadness

text_A: Failing examn.
label: sadness

text_A: When my girl and I decided to get back together after our á separation.
label: joy

text_A: Whhen the front tyre of the car burst.
label: fear

text_A: Fear of punishment for having broken an item of value to my á parents.
label: fear

text_A: When my son was born.
label: joy

text_A: Failing in an examn.
label: shame

text_A: I had a schoolmate who went to the hospital as her brain was á bleeding.  She fell unconscious for three days and when I went á to see her I saw the miserable state the family was in.  Moreover á I could not do nothing for her.  I was very sad.  Finally, she á died.
label: sadness

text_A: When I met my mother after not having seen her for three years.
label: joy

text_A: I felt the emotion when I entered a certain ward in the hospital á to visit my relative who was sick.
label: disgust

text_A: [ Never experienced.]
label: shame

text_A: I arrived late at a seminar concerning my major subject at á university, although I had been appointed to formally oppose the á paper which was being presented.
label: shame

text_A: Death of grandfather (unexpected).
label: sadness

text_A: When I discovered my mother had been having an affair with my á father's best friend, and then ran away with him without even á speaking to me about what she was doing letting me come home from á school simply to find her gone. I was filled with disgust and á contempt.
label: disgust

text_A: When my niece was 3 years old she was in the living room while we á were fixing the table for a birthday party and, as every child, á she couldn't stay calm. She burst a balloon. When I told her to á be quiet her father pinched her. I believe if I hadn't said anything á this wouldn't have happened.
label: guilt

text_A: When my first girlfriend an I left each other.
label: sadness

text_A: I met intoxicated people with dubious intentions in a back alley á one Wednesday night.
label: fear

text_A: Walking at friday night through Nijmegen, going to a pub or a á disco.
label: fear

text_A: When my girlfriend's nephew passed away.
label: sadness

text_A: When I patronized a certain tavern which had prostitutes, it was á almost a brothel.
label: disgust

text_A: When my brother promised me money but he failed to fulfill the á promise.
label: disgust

text_A: For example, when I have promised something but I haven't á fulfilled it.
label: guilt

text_A: When I was told that my father had passed away.
label: sadness

text_A: The time I qualified to enter secondary school.
label: joy

text_A: Last week I had planned to play tennis and had booked a tennis á court.   However when I arrived at the university gym the clerk á told me that the court was being used for lessons.
label: anger

text_A: Being alone in Europe and having to catch a train and bus to the á airport, then board the plane alone.
label: fear

text_A: I stayed at the Coast for a weekend with friends. My brother came á to drive me home, but was rude, and in a hurry to rejoin his á friends. I was embarrassed because the family involved was á extremely nice, and hospitable to him.
label: disgust

text_A: Sitting in the dorm when the guys were verbally reading letters á in Penthouse.
label: disgust

text_A: I felt guilty the other day because I took two pieces of bread á instead of one in the Cafeteria and some of the girls were short á of bread.
label: guilt

text_A: When I was 7-8 years old, I woke up one night and found myself á alone at home.  My mother had gone out to buy cigarattes from a á machine.
label: fear

text_A: A shop in Downtown wouldn't accept my Visa Card - before December á last year.
label: anger

text_A: When I heard of the death of a friend who had just finished her á training I felt very sad for she was young.
label: sadness

text_A: When somebody made me touch human faeces.
label: disgust

text_A: One fears many things, for example one fears going to the á dentist. but as far as I am concerned this feeling is connected á with the examination session.
label: fear

text_A: I know that a certain person feels very lonely, and that she á always looks forward to seeing me. However, often I am too á busy to visit her, then I feel guilty.
label: guilt

text_A: My uncle was taken to the UTC for an operation as he had cancer.  á There had been a lot of deaths of late - 3 out of every 4 á operated.  I was scared for my uncle's life.
label: fear

text_A: General Ye Jianying died.
label: sadness

text_A: Realizing that a friend had been talked into signing a certain á contract.
label: anger

text_A: My Uncle was beaten by his troublesome son. He fell unconscious á and gained consciousness after some time. That time I was at á school; this news reached me through someone.
label: sadness

text_A: My relationship with a boyfriend was finished and I didn't á succeed a years-course.
label: sadness

text_A: When climbing up the stairs to the top of a ski-jumping hill.
label: fear

text_A: I had gone camping with my old classmates and there was a storm.  á We were in a flurry but at that time I felt the love and concern á of my friends.
label: joy

text_A: When I was hitch-hiking and I went with a man who drived like a á madman.
label: fear
